fr.umlv.escape.front

Class BackGroundScroller

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.umlv.escape.front.BackGroundScroller

  • public class BackGroundScroller
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that manage a scrolling background. The backGroundScroller can scroll an image in the vertical or horizontal way.

    • Constructor Summary
